tags.name: input-wrapper
tags.description: A custom element wrapping `<input>` with `<label>` and extra slots.
tags.jsDoc:
/**
 * A custom element wrapping `<input>` with `<label>` and extra slots.
 *
 * @element input-wrapper
 *
 * @fires change - Event fired on value change (blur)
 * @fires input - Event fired on user input (key)
 *
 * @slot prefix - Slot for prefix content
 * @slot suffix - Slot for suffix content
 * @slot helper - Slot for helper content
 *
 * @attr {boolean} has-value - State attribute set when element has value
 * @attr {boolean} has-label - State attribute set when element has label
 */

attributes.name: has-value
attributes.description: State attribute set when element has value

attributes.name: has-label
attributes.description: State attribute set when element has label

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Disabled element can not be clicked

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Text content to show in the `<label>` element.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Value to set on the wrapped `<input>` element.

attributes.name: helper
attributes.description: Helper text to show below the input.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Disabled element can not be clicked

properties.name: label
properties.description: Text content to show in the `<label>` element.

properties.name: value
properties.description: Value to set on the wrapped `<input>` element.

properties.name: helper
properties.description: Helper text to show below the input.

tags.name: progress-bar
tags.description: A custom element similar to the HTML5 `<progress>` element.
tags.jsDoc:
/**
 * A custom element similar to the HTML5 `<progress>` element.
 *
 * @element progress-bar
 */

attributes.name: min
attributes.description: Minimum bound of the progress bar.

attributes.name: max
attributes.description: Maximum bound of the progress bar.

attributes.name: indeterminate
attributes.description:
Indeterminate state of the progress bar.
This property takes precedence over other state properties (min, max, value).
attributes.jsDoc:
/**
   * Indeterminate state of the progress bar.
   * This property takes precedence over other state properties (min, max, value).
   */

properties.name: min
properties.description: Minimum bound of the progress bar.

properties.name: max
properties.description: Maximum bound of the progress bar.

properties.name: indeterminate
properties.description:
Indeterminate state of the progress bar.
This property takes precedence over other state properties (min, max, value).
properties.jsDoc:
/**
   * Indeterminate state of the progress bar.
   * This property takes precedence over other state properties (min, max, value).
   */

tags.name: range-slider
tags.jsDoc:
/**
 * A custom element wrapping `<input type="range">`.
 *
 * @element range-slider
 *
 * @fires change - Event fired when value change is committed
 * @fires value-changed - Event fired when value is changed by the user
 */

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Disabled element can not be clicked

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Value set on the wrapped `<input>` element.
attributes.jsDoc:
/**
   * Value set on the wrapped `<input>` element.
   *
   * @memberof RangeElement
   */

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Disabled element can not be clicked

properties.name: value
properties.description: Value set on the wrapped `<input>` element.
properties.jsDoc:
/**
   * Value set on the wrapped `<input>` element.
   *
   * @memberof RangeElement
   */

events.name: change
events.description: Event fired when value change is committed

events.name: value-changed
events.description: Event fired when value is changed by the user
